titleStmt.title: An account of Mr. Lock's religion, out of his own writings, and in his own words together with some observations upon it, and a twofold appendix : I. a specimen of Mr. Lock's way of answering authors ..., II. a brief enquiry whether Socinianism be justly charged upon Mr. Lock.
titleStmt.author: Milner, John, 1628-1702.
Locke, John, 1632-1704. Selections. 1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by J. Nutt ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by John Milner. Cf. BM; Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
